head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WADLER, DR. SCOTT

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WADLER, DR. SCOTT

block.p: WADLER--Dr. Scott, of Larchmont, NY oncologist at Cornell Weill New York Presbyterian Hospital died peacefully on April 28th at Calvary Hospital after a long illness. He leaves his adoring wife Ronni, and his wonderful son Jonas Gabriel Wadler and daughter Zoe Alexis Schaeffer and son-in-law Jonathan Schaeffer as well as his adoring mother, Sylvia Wadler and his loving sister Blythe Smith and her husband Kevin Smith. Memorial details will follow.
